summary: Encapsulates configuration and translation logic for Vertex AI's text embedding service, handling options such as automatic truncation, task type selection, and optional document title, while providing utilities to map OpenAI‑style parameters and responses to Vertex AI formats.
business_intent: Allow developers to seamlessly integrate Vertex AI text embeddings into applications that expect OpenAI‑compatible APIs, simplifying migration and enabling consistent embedding generation for retrieval or fine‑tuned tasks.
